Description: A ninja from an unknown land.
A dark wizard from the Caelia.
A conjuror whose origin eludes all.
A cleric exiled from the Kingdom of Vorpa.
A bat from the darkest parts of the tomb.
A minor goblin from the Golobogos Islands.
A minotaur gone mad with vengeance.
A soldier whose face is long forgotten.
The heaviest armoros you’ve ever seen!
A dark spirit rejected by Heaven and ignored by Hell.
A conjurer of the darkness and malice.
A long-dead warrior shadow that lives off of blood.
